title: Flightline, Undefeated in Six Races, Romps at the Breeders’ Cup
description: The 4-year-old colt, never seriously challenged in six starts, won by 8 ¼ lengths. His owners must decide whether to keep racing him or retire him to the breeding barn.
dc:creator: Joe Drape

media:content.media:description: Flightline, with Flavien Prat aboard, chased a fast pace and cruised to victory after taking the lead in the final turn.
